thread.title: Puerto Rico Utility Reaches Tentative Pact With Bondholders, Source Says
thread.title_full: Puerto Rico Utility Reaches Tentative Pact With Bondholders, Source Says - WSJ

author: Mike Cherney
title: Puerto Rico Utility Reaches Tentative Pact With Bondholders, Source Says
text:
Puerto Rico’s power authority and a group of bondholders have reached a verbal agreement on the framework of a restructuring plan for the agency’s $9 billion in debt, according to a person familiar with the situation.
Representatives for the bondholder group and the agency faced a midnight deadline on Tuesday to come to terms on a restructuring plan. The person familiar with the situation cautioned that the deal could still fall... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
